article_title: Another Health Plan You Have To Struggle To Keep After Obamacare

article_metadata.description: BY JUSTIN HASKINS - The Robert Wood Johnson Foundation reports only one-third of the nearly 800 PPO plans offered in 48 states by 93 separate health insurance carriers in 2015 are available in 2016, with 28% of the 790 PPO plans being dropped entirely.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
